author: Chuck DeVore
title: Amid the Coronavirus Pandemic, Keep a Watchful Eye on China's Military | Opinion
description: In the middle of this costly and frightening health crisis, ominous clouds of a different sort have been gathering in Asia.
content:
The world as seen by Xi Jinping is different from it was in January 2016.
At the time, the Chinese Communist Party (CCP) was strong at home, as its power and prestige were growing abroad. Hong Kong was prosperous and quiescent. The "rebellious province of Ta… [+6563 chars]
